Articles.Content:
**Kerbal Wiki App for Android Prewiew.**

* * *

I'm finishing the application for Android. It's a simple app with informations about planets, moons and Kerbol in versions 1.0.x. I think it's important because the [Amagi 82's app](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82203-Kerbal-Space-App-for-Android!) is very old. The design is simple, I'm terrible programator and I'm programing in AppInventor. It will be finished in one week. I will take here a link on Google Play and in the app, I will take a link hither.

Features:

- Orbital Characteristics
- Physical Characteristics
- Atmosphere Characteristics
- List of biomes
- Biomes Images
- Atmosphere graphs
- All these features for free

Future features:

- A kerbonaut's section
- The Science Tree
- Desription of some favourite mods (MechJeb, Remote Tech, Kerbal Engineer Redux...)
- Delta-V calculator
- Parachute calculator
- And some tutorials...

Bye for now.

App coming soon.
That's a great plan, I'll be sure to download the mod when it's ready
Hmm.. Looks cool but will it be on iOS App Store? I would understand if not, App Store is not to user-friendly.
I'll check it out when you release. Sounds like a nifty side app.

Another proof that KSP community is just awesome ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Hmm.. Looks cool but will it be on iOS App Store? I would understand if not, App Store is not to user-friendly.

No, the App Inventor isn't yet on iOS. If it will be, then I will do a version for you ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
